WorkItem.Description: I belive Elemental Precision is being calculated wrong. It tells me with my current gear I have 204 hit rating when I know I only have 167. In the Item budget it also dosn't tell me I need hit rating untill I drop it down below 13%. Elemental Precision is lowering the hit cap like it should but then it also adds an extra 3% hit rating on top of it like it shouldn't.

Comments.Message: I'm guessing you're Frost. Rawr's calculation is accurate; Elemental Precision *does* give 6% frost hit, even though it only says it gives 3%.
What Astrylian said is true. Also the hit rating that is displayed includes the buffs you have enabled like totem of wrath and inspiring presence.
No I'm fire and it really should be giving 3%. Last I checked totem of wrath never gave spell hit only spell crit.

Totem of Wrath Rank 1 
5% of base Mana
Instant cast 
Tools: Fire Totem
Summons a Totem of Wrath with 5 health at the feet of the caster.  The totem increases the chance to hit and critically strike with spells by 3% for all party members within 20 yards.  Lasts 2 min. 

http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=30706
Wow can't belive I never knew that. Case closed i guess.
